item.title: What does AI think of Loving-Kindness? Here is a poem.
item.description: ai generated art for this post I asked openai chatGPT to write a buddhist poem on loving-kindness in the style of Dr. Seuss. This is what I got. With open hearts and open hands, We spread loving-kindness across the lands. Like ripples on a pond, it starts with one, But soon it touches everyone. With each kind word and thoughtful deed, We plant the seeds of love, in hearts to breed.
